cs.CG, cs.DS, cs.DM, cs.CC, cs.AI. 

The paper deals with the problem of vertex guarding for polygons, which is a classic problem in computational geometry and falls under the category of computational geometry (cs.CG). The paper also discusses approximation algorithms and set cover, which are topics in algorithms and data structures (cs.DS). The minimum visibility decomposition of polygons is a combinatorial problem, which falls under the category of discrete mathematics (cs.DM). The paper also discusses approximation factors, which is a topic in computational complexity (cs.CC). Finally, the paper proposes algorithms that use heuristics and optimization techniques, which are topics in artificial intelligence (cs.AI).
